DOC.brief_summary: A study assess interaction acohol oral treprostinil .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetic Interaction Oral Treprostinil Ethanol Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: This study compare effect ethanol PKs 1 mg dose UT-15C healthy volunteer determine vivo effect ethanol , include time ethanol consumption relation UT-15C ingestion . This open-label , randomize , single-center , four-way ( period ) , crossover study 28 healthy volunteer receive single 1 mg oral dose UT-15C and/or ethanol . Eligible subject randomly assign one four treatment sequence subject receive four sequence pre-specified order .
DOC.criteria: 1 . The subject voluntarily give informed consent participate study . 2 . Women child bear potential include female experience menarche undergone successful surgical sterilization . Women childbearing potential must practice true abstinence intercourse line prefer usual lifestyle , use two different form highly effective contraception duration study , least 30 day discontinue study medication . Medically acceptable form effective contraception include : ( 1 ) approve hormonal contraceptive ( birth control pill ) , ( 2 ) barrier method use spermicide , ( 3 ) intrauterine device , ( 4 ) partner vasectomy .
